gui.title_crashed_without_report: Oops, $CONFIG.text.modpack_name$ crashed without a crash report!
gui.comment_under_title:
Post the generated message from the "$LANG.gui.upload_all_comment$" button in $CONFIG.text.support_place$.
Additionally, provide some details about how the crash happened.
gui.comment_under_title_cant_resolve: If you can't resolve the problem by reading logs, join the $CONFIG.text.support_name$.
gui.comment_under_title_pls_report: If you want to report the problem or need help, join the $CONFIG.text.support_name$.
gui.comment_under_title_screenshot_notic: Please read the text above carefully. Screenshot of this GUI, tells us nothing!
gui.copy_split_log_dialog_text: The size of $FILE_NAME$ $LOG_TOO_BIG_REASON$ exceeds the limits of mclo.gs. To minimize the risk of losing important information due to the log being cut off at the end, we have split it into a head and tail of 25k lines or 10MB each. Link to which part of the log would you like to $ACTION$?
gui.upload_all_button: Upload all and copy message with links to all files and mod list diff
gui.upload_all_finished_button: Copy message with links to all files and mod list diff
gui.untrusted_domain_question: Do you want to open this link?
